thumb.title: A new legend is born!
thumb.description: 3 years ago I was in despair, now I'm living my dream! I got funding and now I'm working full time on my monster hunting game. Gianthook and the legacy weapon Humbagun are ready! You can add the game to your wishlist on Steam and help me achieve my dream ðŸŽ®âœ¨https://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?curator_clanid=45095802#art #animation #gaming #steam #videogames #indiedev
